verses.verse: See <S%H7200><s%>, I have <S%H7121>called<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur<s%>, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>:

and I have <S%H4390>filled<s%> him with the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, in <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and in <S%H8394>understanding<s%>, and in <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, and in all manner of <S%H4399>workmanship<s%>,
to <S%H2803>devise<s%> skilful <S%H4284>works<s%>, to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and in <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and in <S%H5178>brass<s%>,
and in <S%H2799>cutting<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%> for <S%H4390>setting<s%>, and in <S%H2799>carving<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%>, to <S%H6213>work<s%> in all manner of <S%H4399>workmanship<s%>.

And <S%H5414>I<s%>, behold, I have appointed with him <S%H171>Oholiab<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H294>Ahisamach<s%>, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>; and in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of all that <S%H2450>are<s%> <S%H3820>wise-hearted<s%> I have <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, that they may <S%H6213>make<s%> all that I have commanded <S%H6680>thee<s%>:

the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, and the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%> that is <S%H3627>thereupon<s%>, and all the furniture of the <S%H168>Tent<s%>,
and the <S%H7979>table<s%> and its <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> with all its <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%>,
and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> with all its <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and its <S%H3653>base<s%>,

and the finely <S%H8278>wrought<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, to minister in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office,

and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and the <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> spices for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6680>place<s%>: according to all that I have commanded thee shall they <S%H6213>do<s%>.

Speak <S%H1696><s%> thou also unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H389>Verily<s%> ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>: for it is a <S%H226>sign<s%> between me and you throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>; that ye may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> who sanctifieth <S%H6942>you<s%>.

Ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H6944>therefore<s%>; for it is holy unto <S%H2490>you<s%>: every one that profaneth it shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>; for whosoever <S%H6213>doeth<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H5315>therein<s%>, that soul shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Six <S%H8337><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H4399>work<s%> be <S%H6213>done<s%>; but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> day is a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of solemn <S%H7677>rest<s%>, <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; whosoever <S%H6213>doeth<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

Wherefore the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, to <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%>, for a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

It is a <S%H226>sign<s%> between me and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: for in <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>, and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H7673>rested<s%>, and was <S%H5314>refreshed<s%>.

And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, when he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>communing<s%> with him upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>, <S%H3789>written<s%> with the <S%H676>finger<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.
